titleStmt.title: Clericus mercati, &c. An humble remonstrance of the severall heads and ground-worke conceived, for the draught of a bill of information, to be exhibited into the High Court of Parliament. Concerning the generall clarke of the market, and the legall proceedings thereof.
titleStmt.author: Agar, Ben, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
